jp.kobe_u.sugar.csp

Class LinearGeLiteral

  • java.lang.Object
    • jp.kobe_u.sugar.csp.Literal
      • jp.kobe_u.sugar.csp.LinearLiteral
        • jp.kobe_u.sugar.csp.LinearGeLiteral

  • public class LinearGeLiteral
extends LinearLiteral
    This class implements a comparison literal of CSP. The comparison represents the condition "linearSum >= 0".
    See Also:
    CSP, LinearSum

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      LinearGeLiteral(LinearSum linearSum)
      Constructs a new comparison literal of given linear expression.
